By touching a solid surface with their hand or finger, the user can channel their chakra through the area, allowing them to accurately scan it. From this a person can roughly map out entire structures and surroundings, as well as determine the presence and location of targets in the surrounding area. Doing so allows to detect for threats, traps, and hidden rooms. It is also possible to determine the weak points and fine details in a single structure.
